analysis.description:
Lotthereum.closeRound (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#110-119) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Lotthereum.currentRound
	- Lotthereum.balances
	- Lotthereum.rounds
	- Lotthereum.winners

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#126-128:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_blockPointer' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#67) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxNumberOfBets' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#67-68) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_minAmountByBet' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#68) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_prize' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#68-69) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_hash' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#69) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_a' of Lotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/31/0x3c563651318b6b2cf555207a1e611bb577fff446.sol#129) is not in mixedCase
